content.rendered:
Directed by Ravi Arasu

Written by Ravi Arasu

Cast Aruldoss . G.V. Prakash Kumar (Murugan).G. Marimuthu. George Maryan. Irene Meena (Nurse). Mahima Nambiar. Aadukalam Naren. Hareesh Peradi. Azhagam Perumal. Siddhartha Shankar. Saravana Subbiah. Kaali Venkat. Abhishek Vinod

Language Tamil

Producers B. Ganesh

Production Common Man Pictures
